Name: Google Cloud Platform Load Balancer Logs
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description: The Google Cloud Platform Load Balancer solution for Microsoft Sentinel allows you to monitor your GCP Load Balancer in Microsoft Sentinel. This solution includes a data connector and enables ingestion of the GCP Load Balancer Logs into Microsoft Sentinel. The logs ingested also enable monitoring GCP Cloud Armour/GCP WAF logs.
BasePath: C:\GitHub\Azure-Sentinel\Solutions\Google Cloud Platform Load Balancer Logs\
